sourcesContent:
import React from 'react'; const AgingReport = ({ aging, customers }) => { return (
{/* Aging Summary */}

Aging Summary

Current (0-30 days) ${aging.current.toFixed(2)}
31-60 days ${aging.days30.toFixed(2)}
61-90 days ${aging.days60.toFixed(2)}
Over 90 days ${aging.over90.toFixed(2)}
Total Outstanding ${(aging.current + aging.days30 + aging.days60 + aging.days90 + aging.over90).toFixed(2)}
{/* Collection Priority */}

Collection Priority

{customers .filter(customer => customer.overdueAmount > 0) .sort((a, b) => b.overdueAmount - a.overdueAmount) .slice(0, 5) .map((customer, index) => (
{customer.name}
Last payment: {customer.lastPayment}
${customer.overdueAmount.toFixed(2)}
#{index + 1} Priority
))}
); }; export default AgingReport;
